div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1290 Caria, 1969 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 100 AE Philip III: c. 10 (as SNGCop. 1170-1, attrib. to Philip IV) Cassander: c. 12 (as SNGCop. 1163-4) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 (as Newell, nos. 162-3?) Eupolemus: c. 10 (as SNGCop. 1165-9) Gergis: 1+ (as BMC 2 ff.) Miletus: 1+ (as BMC 76 ff.) Caunus: 1+ (as BMC 3 ff.) Mylasa: c. 30 (as Akarça nos. 33 ff.) Myndus: 1+ (as Akarça no. 20) Rhodes: 1+ (as BMC 74 ff.) Disposition: dispersed This hd. may be part of no. 1289 above
